name: Prjemian.github.io
body:
### Welcome to Pete Jemian's GitHub Page

# Various software projects are available

## Science

* https://github.com/prjemian/sizes: analyze small-angle scattering data for a size distribution using maximum entropy
* https://github.com/prjemian/jldesmear: correct small-angle scattering data for slit-smearing
* https://github.com/prjemian/lake: previous C version of jldesmear
* https://github.com/prjemian/jlake: previous Java version of jldesmear
* https://github.com/prjemian/spec2nexus: convert SPEC data files to NeXus

## Control Systems

* https://github.com/prjemian/epicspi: Install EPICS on the Raspberry Pi
* https://github.com/prjemian/cmd_response: Arduino as I/O for EPICS (such as on Raspberry Pi)
* https://subversion.xray.aps.anl.gov/trac/bcdaext/browser/bcdaqwidgets/trunk: BcdaQWidgets: PyEpics-aware PySide widgets for the APS

## Utilities

* https://github.com/prjemian/pyRestTable: format a nice table in reST from Python

## Contributor

* http://nexusformat.org: NeXus data standard (documentation editor)
* http://www.cansas.org/formats/canSAS1d/1.1/doc: canSAS v1.1 data standard for 1-D small-angle scattering data
* http://www.cansas.org/formats/canSAS2012/1.0/doc/: canSAS draft data standard for any-D small-angle scattering data
* https://github.com/nexpy/nexpy: visualize NeXus data
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
